messages.message:
I used the attached document in chat mode and asked “Translate the document to Polish. Keep the original formatting”
The answer never arrived and it clogged my laptop with chrome using 100% of CPU

We are creating a separate app for translating, which would remain the full layout of such docs @jayasooryan 

Converse is not intended for translation use case
It will be interesting to figure out what happened here though
Regardless, the app hanging and taking the whole CPU is a bug

probably same issue as https://instabase.slack.com/archives/C0516UPPMT3/p1685570793538519 (https://instabase.slack.com/archives/C0516UPPMT3/p1685570793538519)? think maybe markdown rendering breaks when there are a lot of spaces, which is pretty common for documents with tables like this one
https://instabase.slack.com/archives/C0516UPPMT3/p1685570793538519 the fix for this one was merged today by @Subash
it hasn’t been deployed to aihub.instabase.com (http://aihub.instabase.com) yet right?
No, will probably get deployed to dev sandbox in the next deploy
